function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Self-reported presence of sunlight may affect the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Inaccurate reporting may lead to incorrect conclusions about the role of sunlight in disease propagation.","Mitigation":"Use objective measures of sunlight exposure to validate self-reported data.","Technologies":"Sunlight sensors, UV meters, and light meters for accurate measurement.","People":"Participants providing information on sunlight exposure.","Owner":"Researchers conducting the survey."},{"Description":"Presence of plant pots and green spaces may impact the transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Inadequate or improper greenery management may contribute to the spread of diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement proper maintenance and hygiene practices for indoor greenery.","Technologies":"Smart plant pots, automated watering systems, and air purifying plants.","People":"Residents with plant pots and green spaces.","Owner":"Building management, residents, and urban planners."},{"Description":"Proximity to natural outdoor environments and road types may influence disease transmission.","Impact":"High density or lack of green spaces in urban areas may increase disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Urban planning for green spaces, pedestrian-friendly areas, and air quality improvement.","Technologies":"Green infrastructure, air quality monitoring systems, and urban planning tools.","People":"Residents living in different types of neighborhoods and road environments.","Owner":"Local authorities, urban planners, and environmental organizations."}]}
